FuncDef: This command creates a queue group template. The system does not maintain default queue groups or queue group templates. Each queue group template used in the system must be explicitly created.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the queue group template up to 32 characters. Each ingress queue group template must be uniquely named within the system. Multiple ingress queue group templates may not share the same name. An ingress and egress queue group template may share the same name.
Keyword used to create the queue group instance. The create keyword requirement can be enabled/disabled in the environment>create context.
